name: Down a Dark Hall
description: A troubled teen named Kit Gordy is forced to join the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, just to find herself trapped by dark forces around its mysterious headmistress, Madame Duret.

review.author: jfgibson73
review.heading: Forgettable girl's school horror
review.reviewBody: Well I like the idea of spooky stuff going on in an old boarding school. I just didn't think this movie did it very memorably. Uma being miscast was distracting, although I thought Anna was likeable. The ending did have some level of satisfaction, but nothing that will stay with you. Just a cheaply made disposable horror that no one will find scary.

keywords: troubled teen,private school,schoolgirl,piano playing,teacher student relationship
